duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and process member applications, ensuring accuracy and compliance with departmental policies and procedures.
Enter and verify member data, including benefit assignment, group affiliation, and provider selection, to maintain core eligibility system.
Provide excellent customer service by conducting outbound calls to members, clarifying information and completing member's enrollment requests.
Prepare and distribute eligibility reports, member correspondence, and accurate data from regulatory system replies within defined timelines.
Reconcile discrepancies in member data and various systems, and research eligibility rejected transactions to report findings.
Maintain professional and technical knowledge, provide training to co-workers, and attend meetings and process improvement teams.
Support the achievement of SCAN’s Vision and Goals, as well as perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: G.E.D./High School diploma (1 year experience in Medicare managed care health plan required)
